alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 10:40PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will continue through this evening. Expect widespread winter driving conditions across mountain routes Saturday evening into Sunday night. If traveling, be prepared for potential traction restrictions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
